review: The first and foremost advantage of this guest house is that ,it is only 15 steps away from the Ram ghat.The ropeway that leads on to the complex of the Mansa Devi Temple is also a five minute walk.The hotel is situated in a bylane inside the Haridwar market . It is also a five minute walk from the historic Har Ki Paudi ghat .
name: Kinshuk Guha
